mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER_EMAIL_VERIFY ( USER_ID, EMAIL, VERIFY_CODE, EXPIRY_DATE, IS_VERIFIED, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{email}, #{verifyCode}, #{expiryDate}, 'N', NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE EMAIL = #{email}, VERIFY_CODE = #{verifyCode}, EXPIRY_DATE = #{expiryDate}, IS_VERIFIED = 'N', UPDATED_DATE = NOW();
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, EMAIL, VERIFY_CODE, EXPIRY_DATE, IS_VERIFIED FROM TB_USER_EMAIL_VERIFY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER_EMAIL_VERIFY SET IS_VERIFIED = #{isVerified}, UPDATED_DATE = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
